LocalLogFiles.FileContent:
> . . . . . MAIN OBJECTIVE INSTRUCTIONS:


> . . . Kill Olbap,

> . . . Find monsters' nests and make sure they don't spawn enemies anymore,
> . Nests are located in zones with specific name. Monsters will always spawn in certain area - that's where the nest is. 
> . You'll find terminal there as well. Use it to disable the spawns.

> . . . Figh7 $t_h;... big wav/..^@! @^%&! *&$)( $#;./ !%7*#%...

> . . . <color=red>://ERROR!</color>

> . . . <color=red>://ERROR!</color>

> . . . <color=red>://ERROR!</color>

UniqueCommands.CommandDesc: Enter this command if you are playing this map for the <color=orange>first time</color>

CommandEvents.WardenIntel:
<color=white>This is <color=red>Olbap</color>.
You can see it through the window.</color>

<color=white>Don't be scared when you see it.
<color=red>Olbap</color> is not strong. It's pretty weak in this rundown.</color>
<color=white>So your first task on this map is to kill it.<color=red>Good luck!</color></color>

UniqueCommands.CommandDesc: Enter this command <color=red>only</color> if your whole squad has played this map before

Enter this command if you did not kill Olbap

Appreciate your honesty

EventsOnApproachDoor.WardenIntel: <color=orange>Look! This is an <color=green>E</color>rror <color=green>A</color>larm <color=green>R</color>eset <color=green>S</color>tation (<color=green>EARS</color>). You can turn off an alarm once a game.</color>
<color=orange>However, if you open one, you <color=red>won't</color> be able to open any <color=green>EARS</color> later in the run.</color>
